web_design.title: Web Design
web_design.text: You and I will design an aesthetically pleasing website, capable of being scaled.

brand_strategy.title: Brand Strategy
brand_strategy.text: We will figure out how best to exemplify your brand and push its awareness.

mission.title: Web Development
mission.text: I will develop a scalable and responsive website with tools such as React, Nextjs, Express, ...etc.

about.title: About
about.text: Hey my name is <1> Sebastien</1>, an intrigued developer, particularly when it involves solving problems, or figuring out a balance between creative design and meeting deadlines.

focus.title: My Focus
focus.text: I'm currently focused on using <1>React</1> with <3>Typescript</3> to actualize great ideas. A couple of my everyday tasks include writing reusable components, building <5>SSR</5> / <7>SPA</7> / <9>SSG</9>, managing the clients state, writing tests to ensure the <11>div stays centered</11>, and communicating with the Backend via REST, GraphQL, and Websocket API calls.

projects.text: Here are some of my projects:

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.text: I believe that when finding true mastery, one must always seek and explore new ideas and not be afraid to experiment! That's why I'm always eager with any challenge that I face.

footer.text: © 2022 — Built & Designed with ♡. Made with NextJS, TailwindCSS, and React. Hosted on Vercel.
